2.0.387.1: Determined necessary dependencies, greatly speeding up execution of any single program
2.0.387.2: Rewrote msn2 library to incorporate new, safer syntax, this includes many tests
2.0.387.3: Implemented 'argument picker' for def() defined functions, allowing for more flexible argument passing

2.0.388.1: Added '!' specifier for object methods, this specifier forces the method to be destructive regardless of the prior value of the variable calling the method.
2.0.388.2: Added partial type enforcements, this has only been applied to the existing MSN2 package functions. User functions may come in the future.
2.0.388.3: Enabled the MSN2 interpreter to interpret multi-lined blocks of code for a few more cases (line ending with ',', etc...)
2.0.388.4: Added ai.tokens(), ai.advanced(), ai.query() in the msn2 ai class
2.0.388.5: Added chatgpt:instance class to lib/auto/chatgpt for more control over a ChatGPT model (demo in demos folder)
2.0.388.6: Updated the msn2 ai class model structure, and with a few more models (WIP)
2.0.388.8: Improved performance in general interpretation. This includes simplifying potentially tight loops and common method executions such as argument parsing.

2.0.401.1: Added msn2cli.py for more control over executing .msn2 programs

2.0.402.1: Created function dispatch for the general MSN2 interpreter functions and objects, this should significantly improve performance in the long run. This is not yet done for pywinauto automation.
2.0.402.2: Created longstring() (ls() alias) for multi-line strings
2.0.402.3: Published VS Code extension 'msn2-syntax-highlighting' for .msn2 file extension syntax highlighting
2.0.402.4: Converted main function interpretation to a dispatch table, this should significantly improve performance in the long run
2.0.402.5: Fixed a bug involving MSN2 portable package generation
2.0.402.6: Fixed a bug involving '{python_alias} msn2cli.py int' to start the MSN2 interpreter
2.0.402.7: Fixed a bug involving the 'Getting Started' and 'Suggested Usage' help pages
2.0.402.8: Fixed a bug involving the CLI 'element' command
2.0.402.13: Removed auto-installing dependencies, but keeping the capability to auto install
2.0.402.14: Removed auto printing errors with JS() and C()
2.0.402.15: Migrated documentation to CLI / legacy execution method and hybrids
2.0.402.16: Deprecated <msn2element> and <msn2> inserts, only {==} inserts are allowed within calls such as script() or longstring()
2.0.402.17: trace.before() with no arguments now returns the total number of interpretations
2.0.402.18: Changed alias() with no arguments to return the current python_alias

2.0.403.1: Restructured core functionality layout in core/ for readability, scalability, and maintainability
2.0.403.2: Moved javascript generation functions and files to core/using_js/
2.0.403.4: Fixed bugs with excel() and corresponding classes/functions
